alert.note: Alert for Gloucester; Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 5:16PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern New Castle, northwestern Salem, northwestern Gloucester, southeastern Chester and southwestern Delaware Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 515 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Talleyville, or 7 miles northwest of Wilmington, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Chester, Pennsville, Westtown, Carneys Point, Elsmere, Kennett Square, New Castle, Penns Grove, Swedesboro, Newport, Arden, Talleyville, Elam, Chelsea, Ashland, Beckett, Greenville, Delaware Memorial Bridge and Chester Township. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 1 and 2. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 4. Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 12 and 23. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
